resources.string: Night will fall before you can reach civilization by road, but a nearby path leads into the forest.

string-array.name: mTxtBodyArray
string-array.item: 0Night will fall before you can reach civilization by road, but a nearby path leads into the forest.
1As you follow the path, it begins to wind. An hour in, you hear a voice calling for help.
2The sun sets as you walk along the road.
3You venture off the path, but cannot locate the source of the cries. You cannot find the path you left.
4You find yourself in an open area with a small cabin. As the path is well worn, it is likely still in use.
5While you do not find the path, you happen upon a clearing with an amazing waterfall! At least you have fresh water.
7The vehicle stops, and the occupant seems friendly enough. She offers to take you to the nearest town.
